summary: A freestyle, imagined telling of the life of shaman queen Himiko, who falls in love with her half-brother, making her powers weaken thus putting her position to risk.
cast: Shima Iwashita|Masao Kusakari|Rie Yokoyama|Chôichirô Kawarasaki|Kenzô Kawarasaki|Yoshi Katô|Jun Hamamura|Tsuchimi Kurata|Teishiro Nishijima|Mitsugu Fujita|Tadashi Yoshizumi|Mayumi Kyô|Akio Marubayashi|Akemi Harada|Yôko Shibata|Mamoru Shiraishi|Hikaru Akasaki|Tomoko Takano|Mitsuko Motonaga|Tamae Ônishi|Masako Kizaki|Yôko Kinno|Wakayo Matsumura|Takashi Tanaka|Sentarô Kaneko|Nobuaki Takahashi|Akira Nakagawa|Haruhiko Saitô|Hirohito Fujiyoshi|Tetsuo Ichimada|Kazumasa Negishi|Tatsumi Hijikata|Rentarô Mikuni
keywords: shaman|name in title|knife in vagina|pierced by arrow|hit by multiple arrows
title: Himiko
